Headline: #18 16th/18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 18th/ Peoria
ShortDescription: Eastbound 18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Blue Island, Roosevelt and Halsted: due to, street blockage near 18th/Peoria.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Blue Island, Roosevelt and Halsted: due to, street blockage near 18th/Peoria.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
